page.title: 18A NORMAL SATURDAY IN B.H.
page.content: Every other Saturday I work in my grandads greengrocers shop. I take it in turn with my cousin. If I am working I will get up at 8.10 and catch a tube from Theydon Bois where I live to Debden where the shop is. The journey is only one stop and costs 20p. I start work at 9.00. My job is to keep the place tidy by doing various things and loading bags of coal into my grandads large van. At about 11:30 a.m we deliver the coal orders to the houses. I finish work at noon and get paid Â£4.00. Normally I go up to my nans for some thing to eat before I go home.The after noon I spend leisurely. During the football season I go and see Arsenal play.If I don't go out I will just stay at home watching the sport on T.V.During the evening we either have visitors or go out ourselves.
